metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez López, F
Rodríguez Peñalver, M
Márquez Contreras, M C
Gutiérrez Macías, A
Martínez Infante, J
Torralba Gascón, A
metadata.dc:description: Authors report a Sandifer's Syndrome: dystonic postures as a pseudoneurologic symptoms, associated to disorders of the hiatus. Its consideration is of importance taking it into account in order to avoid diagnostic errors unnecesary investigations and wrong treatments.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Sandifer.
[Sandifer syndrome].
